price: Und Lut gaben Wir Urteil(skraft) und Wissen und erretteten ihn aus der Stadt, die schlechte Taten zu begehen pflegte. Sie waren ja böse Leute, sie waren Frevler.
arabic: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗا وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ ٱلَّتِي كَانَت تَّعۡمَلُ ٱلۡخَبَٰٓئِثَۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمَ سَوۡءٖ فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: walūṭan ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wanajjaynāhu mina al-qaryati allatī kānat taʿmalu al-khabāitha innahum kānū qawma sawin fāsiqīna
